title: dogabtc
author: dogabtc
content: We are working on a cryptocurrency, we have a budget of 3 million dollars for marketing.But crypto marketing agencies work on a low budget and I don't think they have strong PR connections.What technique or firm would you recommend for PR and marketing cryptocurrencies with a large budget?

comments.author: bitexchangers
comments.body: Hello sir, we already launch proyect with lees money, we can do task step by step with my colombian company for increase your comunnity and make real traffic to your proyect contact me https://www.linkedin.com/in/alain-herrera-otc-expert-bitcoin-market-makers/

comments.author: windnfire
comments.body: Hello there, we can help you with marketing/PRWe got a huge team; more information here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5398012We run ad budget of: 600k$ - for three monthWorked with more than: 50+ crypto projectsThere are a lot of big names on the board. Let's catch up for free consultation: @Windnfire
